Plot: An Insurance Salesman/Ex-Cop is caught up in a criminal conspiracy during his daily commute home.
Title: The Commuter
Writer: Byron Willinger (story by), Philip de Blasi (story by), Byron Willinger (screenplay by), Philip de Blasi (screenplay by), Ryan Engle (screenplay by)
Actors: Liam Neeson, Vera Farmiga, Patrick Wilson, Jonathan Banks
